comments.author: Kate
comments.content: I love artichokes. I normally go the stuffed route, but I think I will have to give this a try. It must be healthier than dipping them in butter.

comments.author: A&N
comments.content: Hi, first time visotor and an instant fan :) I loved the idea of inside out eggs. These artichokes look delightful! I love artichokes but I'm always apprehensive about handling fresh ones. I hope this post helps me overcome that :)

comments.author: Mamatha
comments.content:
I landed on you blog after googling "Vegetarian Paella" and what a treasure trove I've found! I've book-marked your blog and can't wait to try your recipes.

Best wishes,
Mamatha

comments.author: Tofu Mom
comments.content: Oh dear lord I am making these as soon as I can afford artichokes. YUM! Wine, artichokes, tomaotes - Everything I like in one dish!!

comments.author: Kohlerjen
comments.content: These look wonderful!  Great idea to stray from the typical butter or mayo
